summary: An email from an NYPD detective to an Assistant United States Attorney requesting notes and a report regarding Jeffrey Epstein's post-arrest statements. The email includes an attachment titled 'Photocopy_of working_copy_Epstein_Arrest_Folder.pdf'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the requested notes and report regarding his post-arrest statements.

events.title: Epstein's Arrest and Post-Arrest Statements
events.description: The email references a request for notes and a report concerning statements made by Jeffrey Epstein following his arrest.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: An NYPD detective from the Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking Task Force requested Epstein's post-arrest statement notes from a federal prosecutor.
The request was made via email on July 19, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.
The email attachment suggests the existence of a working copy of an 'Epstein Arrest Folder'.
The communication indicates coordination between NYPD and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York on the Epstein case.
